message: Hold (_bHammer) to hammer
Press (_bUse) to place/take/use
Take that block from the Furnace
Place it somewhere on the ground
Do the same with a red one
Do the same with a red one
Use sign to view building recipes
Try to build Furnace using the recipe
Nice! Hammer a chest to get items
Check out new recipe (at sign)
Try to build it. Chest has all you need
rewards: chest red bar red bar grey bar

message: This new building makes gems
Gems can be used to build towers
Try to build a tower
You can disassemble tower using hammer
Move it closer to target dummy
Hammer a wall to repair it
Enemies incoming!
Check The sign for combining instructions
Put one tower on the other to combine
Nice. Now survive few waves
Don't forget to repair wall
Let's add a new building
Try to build it
rewards: chest grey bar grey bar grey bar

message: You can combine it with Furnace
Now you have production of bars
Defend!
New ore aviable!
You can make blue gem for tower
You can make even more ore using combiner
You can make even more ore using combiner
rewards: chest grey bar red bar blue bar

message: You can make even more ore using combiner
Defense time!
Check out new building
Cooker makes potions from ore
Cooker makes potions from ore
Each potion is unique
Don't forget to repair
Good luck!
Put Gem Porducer on bar extractor
Final push!
Well done!
